NK032(khi)002:0: rdzogs pa chen po klong sde rdo rje zam pa'i
NK032(khi)002:1: man ngag gi gzhung zhal gdams dang bcas pa bzhugs
NK032(khi)002:3: rdzogs pa chen po klong sde'i snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i gzhung 'di la don gsum las /
NK032(khi)002:4: dang po dbang po rab 'jug pa klad kyi don la mchod par brjod pa /
NK032(khi)002:5: lta ba ma nor sgom pa ma bcos spyod pa
NK032(khi)002:6: bsam 'das 'bras bu brjod med de bzhi dbyer med
NK032(khi)002:9: gdod nas dag pa'i byang chub sems nyid kyis //
NK032(khi)002:10: nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don bstan pa //
NK032(khi)002:11: gnyis pa dbang 'bring 'jug pa gzhung gi don la gsum las /
NK032(khi)002:12: dang po don gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus la'ang gsum /
NK032(khi)002:13: dang po rna brgyud lung gi gter chen 'grol ba lo rgyus kyis nges shes skyed pa /
NK032(khi)002:14: 1rna ba rgyud lung gi gter chen 'grol //
NK032(khi)002:15: gnyis pa sgom med don gyi gzer chen gdab pa la /
NK032(khi)002:16: 2sgom med don gyi gzer chen gdab //
NK032(khi)002:17: brda don dus kyi brda sgom tshul bla ma'i byin rlabs /
NK032(khi)002:18: gnad kyi brda 'og nas 'byung pa bzhi /
NK032(khi)002:19: gsal ba gnad kyi brda dbang po'i sgo ma 1bkag /
NK032(khi)002:20: mi rtog pa gnad kyi brda 2 dbang po'i sgo
NK032(khi)002:21: ma g.yos pa ste pha rgyud g.yo ba rlung 'dzin
NK032(khi)002:24: 'dzin med ngang la mi gnas par //
NK032(khi)002:25: g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag sbyin //
NK032(khi)002:26: sems nyid mi brtan spros chen la //
NK032(khi)002:27: bde chen thig le'i man ngag sbyin //
NK032(khi)002:28: bde ba gnad kyi brda 'og rlung yid tsam 'then 3pa /
NK032(khi)002:29: dbyer med pa gnad kyi brda lce rtse mo gang
NK032(khi)002:30: la'ang ma brten pa ste ma rgyud bde ba nyams
NK032(khi)002:32: mdor na brda bzhi nyams su blang pa'i don hril gyis dril ba ni /
NK032(khi)002:33: rdo rje zam pa'i rtsa rgyud ye shes gsang ba las /
NK032(khi)002:34: rang lus dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
NK032(khi)002:35: phyi nang rten 'brel thag bcad nas //
NK032(khi)002:36: chos bdun 'byung ba cha snyoms nas //
NK032(khi)002:37: tshogs drug dbang po ma bkag par //
NK032(khi)002:38: tha mal shes pa tsam la bzhag /
NK032(khi)002:39: phyi ru lus kyi 'byung ba snyoms //
NK032(khi)002:41: ma bcos rnal ma'i don la phebs //
NK032(khi)002:42: mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin //
NK032(khi)002:43: rdo rje sems dpa' gud na med //
NK032(khi)002:45: rdo rje'i brda bzhi'i don ngo sprad /
NK032(khi)002:46: tshig lam sems kyi lde mig bstan //
NK032(khi)002:47: tha 1mal tha mal dngos po'i 'dug tshul ni /
NK032(khi)002:49: rten rtag chad kyi mtha' bsal ba /
NK032(khi)002:50: med pas na rig pa rang sar grol //
NK032(khi)002:51: rkyen dang bral bas rig pa rang sar dag /
NK032(khi)002:52: gsum pa re dogs med par dbyings su gtad pa /
NK032(khi)002:53: re dogs med par dbyings la gtad //
NK032(khi)002:54: bsam brjod bral bas ting 'dzin mchog /
NK032(khi)002:55: de bzhin nyid du mya ngan 'das //
NK032(khi)002:56: gnyis pa bar du don nyams su myong ba'i dus la gsum /
NK032(khi)002:57: dbang bzhi'i don brda bzhi la tshang bas dbang ngang gis rdzogs pa /
NK032(khi)002:58: 1dbang ngang gis rdzogs pas bsgom sgrub dge ba'i chos la mi ltos /
NK032(khi)002:59: brda bzhi'i don rgyud la shar bas sku bzhi rang chas su gyur pa /
NK032(khi)002:60: sku 2rang chas su gyur pas gnyis 'dzin las grol /
NK032(khi)002:61: theg pa thams cad kyi don gcig tu rtogs pa'o //
NK032(khi)002:62: don 3gcig tu rtogs pas rtog dpyod las 'das /
NK032(khi)002:63: gsum pa tha ma don nyams su shar ba'i dus la gsum /
NK032(khi)002:64: lam mthar thug tu bstan pa /
NK032(khi)002:65: 1'di ni rdo rje'i lam mchog ste //
NK032(khi)002:66: lus ngag gi 'bad rtsol med par grol ba /
NK032(khi)002:68: de'ang rang gi sems nyid rtogs pa las gzhan min par bstan pa'o //
NK032(khi)002:69: grol 3 ba rang byung gzhan las min //
NK032(khi)002:70: gsum pa dbang po tha ma la zhib tshegs 'bru gnon dpe don dang lung mi 'gal bar bshad /
NK032(khi)002:71: ji ltar bshad pa de rnams gzhung bshad ltar rgyas par 'achadapa'o //
NK032(khi)002:72: bka' sa man+ta nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las /
NK032(khi)002:73: rdo rje snying po'i don gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i rgyud sde bcu gsum dang /
NK032(khi)002:74: pad+ma'i snying po'i don nyams su len pa'i sgrub sde bcu gsum las /
NK032(khi)002:75: gdams ngag 'di ni rgyud sde bcu gsum gyi don /
NK032(khi)002:76: sgrub sde bcu gsum gyi snying po rna brgyud rin po che zam pa'i gdams ngag go //
NK032(khi)002:77: slob dpon bee ro tsa nas bstan pa rdzogs so //
NK032(khi)002:78: 'di rnams kyi don rgyas par slob dpon kun bzang
NK032(khi)002:79: rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gzhung bshad che 'bring chung gsum
